EmailTemplate.name: turbonomic information- increase performance, decrease alerts, defer capital exp
EmailTemplate.subject: turbonomic information- increase performance, decrease alerts, defer capital expenditures (1495469576.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Dennis, Thank you for taking a few minutes to speak with me today. The reason for meeting would be to discuss your ongoing initiatives to improve employee productivity, system reliability, and guarantee the highest level of performance. As you may or may not already be aware, we are working with Tenet Health, Dartmouth-Hitchcock Medical Center <[[http://t.sidekickopen68.com/e1t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7lC8dDMPbW2n0x6l2B9nMJN7t5XYgd7g3HW4WrNJd3MhRlFW4WJ4Ss56dBM3ddwZNK02?t=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.turbonomic.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2FTurbonomic-DartmouthHitchcock-Success-Story.pdf&si=6046510416134144&pi=5ed1de53-022d-44f4-95e4-8295812547d7]]>, TEAMHealth <[[http://t.sidekickopen68.com/e1t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7lC8dDMPbW2n0x6l2B9nMJN7t5XYgd7g3HW4WrNJd3MhRlFW4WJ4Ss56dBM3ddwZNK02?t=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.turbonomic.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2FTurbonomic-TeamHealth-Success-Story.pdf&si=6046510416134144&pi=5ed1de53-022d-44f4-95e4-8295812547d7]]>, Molina Healthcare, Merck, Children’s Hospital Colorado <[[http://t.sidekickopen68.com/e1t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7lC8dDMPbW2n0x6l2B9nMJN7t5XYgd7g3HW4WrNJd3MhRlFW4WJ4Ss56dBM3ddwZNK02?t=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.turbonomic.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2FTurbonomic-ChildrensHospitalCO-Success-Story.pdf&si=6046510416134144&pi=5ed1de53-022d-44f4-95e4-8295812547d7]]> +1,700 more along similar goals including: -33% Improved Performance Through Automated Decisions…validated by VMWare <[[http://www.marketwired.com/press-release/-2090139.htm]]> - Defer capex purchases ≥ 1 year <[[https://www.techvalidate.com/tvid/4AD-741-425]]> - Supports on-premise and cloud workloads (Azure, AWS, Google, IBM) - Agility (Hardware, Storage, App, Container, Hypervisor, Cloud agnostic)Please feel free to forward this on to other members of your team and to reach out if you have any questions. I will also check in next Tuesday. Thanks in advance,Maggie Margaret Schroeder - Turbonomic Sales Development Representative O: 857.305.4608 C: 802.440.2128 500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
